Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'As the Support Force member said, can I trouble you to help me decide on a new look for the frame, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I can't really decide so suddenly.", 3: '6', 4: "I think it's already great as it is.", 5: '7'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The Support Force already sent me a few sketches, Commandant, maybe you can choose one from them...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...The original, no, the Support Force already sent me a few sketches, Commandant, maybe you can choose a more suitable one...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'For the record, I have to say, none of these sketches should ever be approved.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I don't know who submitted these, but no one would want to lay their eyes on a gorilla or a pitch-black version of Lucia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's not only meaningless but it'll also cause immense damage to our team's overall image.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I never thought Lee would be so against it... What if I chose a design similar to my current frame?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...They don't make sense on the battlefield.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I don't think twin tails should appear in battle.", 4: '2'}
